articles.description: Out of the 47 trading sessions since shares of IREDA have traded since listing, it has gained in 31 of them.

articles.title: Hot Stocks: Brokerage firm view on SBI, Tata Motors, LIC Housing and Aditya Birla Capital - The Economic Times
articles.description: CLSA maintained a buy rating on Tata Motors but raised the target price to Rs 1061 from Rs 955 earlier.
articles.content: Brokerage firm CLSA maintained a buy rating on Tata Motors, Jefferies recommended a buy on SBI, CLSA downgraded LIC Housing to outperform and Motilal Oswal maintained a buy rating on Aditya Birla Cap… [+1766 chars]
